item.title: SLB
item.description: score:-43 Chances: Schlumberger is strategically investing in natural gas projects in Europe, aiming to enhance energy security while transitioning to renewable energy sources. US Treasury yields saw a significant decline towards the end of 2023, leading to a massive surge in the last two months of the year for US stocks.

item.title: SEDG
item.description: score:60 Chances: SolarEdge Technologies, Inc. has a strong track record in the energy technology sector, offering inverter solutions and a range of other products and services. The company’s Solar segment, which includes inverter solutions designed to maximize power generation, shows potential for growth and revenue generation.
